channel.title: Stolen Acc
channel.description: On April 05 2011 my acc ii bandos ii was stolen iv been trying to pm General Moderator's And Admin's but there's still no response Iv got all the proof I need to show that it's my acc Iv got picture's of my email with all the notificatsons that I got from Moparscape like when I get a pm I get a notification saying you got a pm on my hotmail and everything I got one last thing that Im not going to show unlesss it's a Gm or Admin I dont want to say it because if the noob that stole my acc see's it he fix it up and yeh no other proof left thanx Sorry if this is on the wrong category had no other choice no one was replying for the last week

item.title: Stolen Acc
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

looks like you were hosting malicious files. Even if your account was ‘hacked’ your lack of account security has caused you to be banned also new account is being banned because you failed to contact an administrator via IRC or email.

Read full topic

item.title: Stolen Acc
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii_is_hack ii bandos ii is hacked
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii_is_hack wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:13, topic:390410”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=499421

User is currently banned [View]
–>
This user is currently affected by the following bans:
User cannot access forum as a result of ban: "ii bandos ii
–>
Reason for ban, to be displayed to banned member.
–>
Nice Try. -SJ

Clear enough?[/quote]

I did not do nothing I swear It was stole even look at the pms i send ii bandos saying wtf why you take my acc and he did not reply or anything ++ Can you see who banned him ? if it’s scape - java then I asked him to delet all the shit the dude posted and he probly banned untill this is figured out !!

item.title: Stolen Acc
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:5, topic:390410”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=486322.msg3563915#msg3563915 date=1302481649]

On April 05 my acc ii bandos ii was stolen iv been trying to pm General Moderator’s And Admin’s but there’s still no response Iv got all the proof I need to show that it’s my acc Iv got picture’s of my email with all the notificatsons that I got from Moparscape like when I get a pm I get a notification saying you got a pm on my hotmail and everything I got one last thing that Im not going to show unlesss it’s a Gm or Admin I dont want to say it because if the noob that stole my acc see’s it he fix it up and yeh no other proof left thanx Sorry if this is on the wrong category had no other choice no one was replying for the last week

So trying to contact a mod, to inform them that your account was hacked, by creating a new account (against the rules)…
[/quote]

If he had no form of contact with administrators I think they will let him off, having more than one account isn’t against the rules anymore? I though only ban evasion was.[/quote]

I thought MITB had his email publicly available? Or at least IRC. And I don’t know, When I first joined it was, and I haven’t really “tested the waters” since then.

Read full topic
